item.title: Spice up your Windows CLI experience
item.description: The terminal experience in windows is not great, but it can be made better. We’ll learn how to turn this into this Oh My Posh Theme: custom | Windows Terminal (in focus mode) Theme: Gruvbox Dark Font: CaskaydiaCove NF Nerd Fonts ðŸ”—Nerd Fonts provides patched versions of monospace fonts containing a large number of glyphs (icons). The glyphs will be needed to correctly render the prompts from oh-my-posh.

item.title: Telescope.nvim: Find files in specific directory
item.description: I like being able to browse files in certain directories from anywhere. Telescope.nvim already has a feature that allows you to browse files in the cwd; with this guide, we’ll extend that feature to only display files in a specific directory. A quick start guide for neovim lua can be found here: nvim-lua-guide. Preview File structure â”œâ”€â”€ init.lua â”œâ”€â”€ lua â”‚ â””â”€â”€ plugins â”‚ â”œâ”€â”€ telescope.
